message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. This is a great deal considering the value it brings.  Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  I'm willing to come down to $10000. It's still a great price considering the value of the product, and it gives us both a good deal. What do you say?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Can you meet me at this price?
